Hi, I'm Claire

Web developer with a background in art, business, customer experience, and project management.

Projects

  • how to build a gundam

    A guide to assembling & painting Gunpla

    Gunpla are plastic model kits from the Gundam universe, a Japanese military science fiction media franchise.

    This is a single-scroll web page with a unique nav based on imagery from the Bandi box design.

  • plog

    A houseplant journal + product reviews

    A more traditional blog with posts managed through Jekyll.

  • Tetris

    Using a tutorial as a core, adding custom JS and CSS

    Playable on desktop and on mobile, and using the original version for the GameBoy handheld as design influence.

  • Pac-Man

    Using a tutorial as a core, adding custom JS, CSS, and sprites

    Playable on desktop only, and using the original version for the GameBoy NES handheld as design influence.

A little more about me

I originally studied Fine Art and then Business Administration.

Customer success (CS), Customer Experience (CE) and operational streamlining were my driving interests before I got into web development.
